# Coherence Framework Vendor Stub
# This is a stub implementation - replace with real package when available

Status: STUB
Created: 2026-02-15
Notes: Placeholder for coherence-framework package. Provides ResidualBlock, CoherenceResult, compute_coherence interfaces.

To replace:
1. Install coherence-framework package: pip install coherence-framework
2. Remove this vendor directory
3. Update imports from cbtsv1.vendor.coherence_framework_stub to coherence
